title: Vayne 6 shots me through Thornmail, Randuin's, and Ninja Tabi
body:
What made it worse is that I could not even touch her, so knowing this I activate Randuin's and try to run.

{{champion:67}} LOL NOPE! {{item:3153}} []http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110511114321/leagueoflegends/images/2/23/Night_Hunter.jpg
